topic.title: Email Users
topic.section: The Journal Manager is able to email the entire set of users or a sub-set of them. Note that all Readers are sent an email notification with the publication of each issue, or each submission, in the case of continuous {help_topic key="publishing.index" text="publishing"}, with a copy of the Table of Contents of that issue, or the title and author of the submission. The journal also should have a Privacy Policy, entered in the Setup and available in About the Journal, which places restrictions on the use of the names and email addresses of registered users.
